question: Any comments?
transcript: No, I just, so I am an introverted person and I wanted to control my stress, but I was being controlled by stress. So. And there is a solution to controlling it. I know. I am working on it. I am trying to working on it. One of them is to, look to the mirror, see yourself in front of a mirror, and talk to yourself, and imagine that you are the examiner and the candidate at the same time. Record your voice, speak, record your voice, then be the judge. Try to, detect the issues and the shortcomings. You be the judge, then record again, try to remove those mistakes and those issues. Gradually, you will be a better and more fluent speaker.
